name: Sauda Gate Pass Report
query:
SELECT
    sauda.name AS sauda_name,
    sauda.total_quantity AS sauda_total_quantity,
    IFNULL(SUM(gate_pass.total_gw_qty), 0) AS total_gate_pass_quantity,
    (sauda.total_quantity - IFNULL(SUM(gate_pass.total_gw_qty), 0)) AS remaining_quantity
FROM
    `tabSauda` sauda
LEFT JOIN
    `tabGate Pass` gate_pass ON gate_pass.sauda = sauda.name
WHERE
    sauda.docstatus = 1  -- Only consider submitted Sauda
GROUP BY
    sauda.name
HAVING
    remaining_quantity > 0  -- Only show Sauda with pending quantities
ORDER BY
    remaining_quantity DESC;
